comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adele_Ritchie "Adele Ritchie (December 21, 1874 – April 24, 1930), was an American prima donna of comic opera and star of Edwardian musical comedies and vaudeville. Her career began in the early 1890s and continued for nearly twenty-five years. Her life would end tragically in a murder-suicide involving a close friend." Evening public ledger. (Philadelphia [Pa.]), 02 Feb. 1916. Page 9, column 4 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045211/1916-02-02/ed-... reveals that Ritchie, who had just been granted a divorce, and Guy Bates Post would marry. They would divorce in 1929 after a near three year separation.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks so much for your research swanq. What a tragic end to her story.  We'll add the information about her second marriage to the record the next time we update.
